numlitem.para: After takeoff, gear remains down for two minutes before retraction, and
Takeoff performance is based on Landing Gear Extended.

operation.para: (Use appropriate Gear Down Takeoff Runway Limit Weight and Takeoff Climb Limit Weight worksheets respective to engine type, in Chapter 5.8 of the AOM.)

numlitem.para: After takeoff, the landing gear must remain extended for a minimum of two minutes to allow the wheel to spin down prior to gear retraction.
An additional 500 lbs. of fuel must be added to account for additional drag of leaving landing gear extended.
Complete T/O Runway Limit and T/O Climb using worksheets in AOM chapter 5.8.
Flaps 1 or 20 takeoff operation is not allowed.
If "OCA" is present on the airport analysis page and is greater than the level off height, contact Flight Control for alternate airport analysis data.

placard.para: Placard near Gear Handle and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
